requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5, AMD FX-4300 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060,
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: Quest2/3, Htc Vive Pro, Vive Focus. Requires motion controllers. Room Scale 2m by 2m (6.5ft by 6.5ft) area required. Joystick movement is supported.
  • Additional Notes: Seems like Valve Index controllers are not working correctly. Looking into this problem.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7, AMD Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 MB available space
  • VR Support: Quest2/3, Htc Vive Pro, Vive Focus. Requires motion controllers. Room Scale 2m by 2m (6.5ft by 6.5ft) area required. Joystick movement is supported.
